name: Chomp'n'Romp
description:
Chomp'n'Romp was originally created within 36 hours at BUG JAM which was held in 2014. Game Jam's theme was "Nursery Rhymes and Lullabies".

As a team, we decided to use a well known Turkish nursery rhyme "dandini dandini dastana" for our game's theme.

Player will take the role of a calf which aims to eat every single cabbage within farm field and tries not to be caught by the farmers.

Made with Unreal Engine 4.

Development Team:

Programming: Alasse

3D Graphics: minigamestudio
